data.name: Climb It
data.detailed_description:
Climb It is a platformer and a puzzle game. In Climb It you play as a bouncing ball. Your goal is to advance in a world divided in multiple areas. Each area is inspired by an old arcade game and contains levels to find.

GAMEPLAY

  • Exploration
Advance in a 2D world full of obstacles. Be skilful and go from area to area. Find all hidden levels in the world.
  • Levels
Once you are in a level you have to collect all bricks without dying to finish the level. Use your brain and get those bricks by all means !

CHALLENGE

If you like a challenge this game is made for you. The sadistic level design will complicate things (No refund for broken mouses). But don’t worry, with enought motivation and focus you will succeed !

data.short_description: Climb It is a platformer and a puzzle game. Find all levels in a world which want to kill you and finish them. But be careful...be prepared to hit the "Restart" button more than once !

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any decent GPU
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
